app.findingMorePeople: Míele ame bubuwo dim na wò. Gatrɔ va kpuie!
app.meetDescription: Nɔ ƒomedodo me kple aƒenɔsitɔwo ɖeɖeko ame siwo kpɔa gome le Ghana ƒe agbenɔnɔ kple nuwɔnawo me
app.heatDescription: Ge ɖe dzeɖoɖoawo kple amehawo ƒe nuwɔnawo me kple Ghana dukɔ me tɔwo
app.suiteDescription: Tu kadodowo le dɔwɔƒewo me le Ghana dɔwɔlawo dome

auth.enterVerificationCode: Ŋlɔ kpeɖoŋu numba si woɖo ɖe wò kaƒomɔ
auth.passwordRequirements: Ele be nyagbe la nanɔ akpaa 6 alo wu nenema
auth.recoverPasswordInstructions: Ŋlɔ wò email doɖi si dzi woaɖo nyagbe tɔtrɔ kadodo ɖo
auth.wrongCode: Numba mele eteƒe o. Taflatse, gadi kpɔ.

settings.managePersonalInformation: Wɔ ɖoɖo le wò ŋutinyawo ŋuti
settings.managePersonalInfo: Wɔ ɖoɖo le wò ŋutinyawo ŋuti
settings.manageAccountSecurity: Wɔ ɖoɖo le wò account-a ƒe dedienɔnɔ ŋuti
settings.manageSecuritySettings: Wɔ ɖoɖo le wò account-a ƒe dedienɔnɔ ŋuti
settings.manageDataUsage: Wɔ ɖoɖo alesi app la zaa data
settings.manageSubscription: Wɔ ɖoɖo le wò subscription ŋuti
settings.upgradeForUnlimited: Bu dzi yi Premium na matches siwo mɔxexe meli o kpakple dɔwɔƒe bubuwo
settings.getAssistance: Xɔ kpekpeɖeŋu le app la zaza me
settings.permanentlyDeleteAccount: Tutu wò account la kple wò nyatakakawo keŋkeŋ
settings.pleaseEnterCurrentPassword: Taflatse, ŋlɔ wò nyagbe si nèzãm fifia
settings.invalidNewPassword: Nyagbe yeye la mele eteƒe o
settings.passwordMustBeSixChars: Ele be nyagbe yeye la nanɔ akpaa 6 alo wu nenema
settings.passwordConfirmationMustMatch: Ele be nyagbe yeye la kple kpeɖoɖodziatɔ la nasɔ
settings.phoneSuccessfullyUpdated: Wotrɔ wò kaƒomɔ nɔmba la dzidzedzetɔe
settings.matchNotificationsTurnedOff: Wotsi match yeye ŋuti nyadzɔdzɔwo nu
settings.updateNotificationsTurnedOff: Wotsi app tɔtrɔwo ŋuti nyadzɔdzɔwo nu
settings.securelyUpdateContactInfo: Trɔ wò kadodo nyatakakawo le mɔ dedie nu
settings.willSendVerificationCode: Míaɖo kpeɖoɖo numba ɖe wò be woaɖo kpe numba sia dzi
settings.emailVerificationNote: Míaɖo kpeɖoɖodzinu ɖe wò be woaɖo kpe email sia dzi
settings.changeAccountEmail: Trɔ wò email le mɔ dedie nu
settings.emailImportantNote: Wozãa wò email na account didi, nyatakakawo vevitɔwo, kple kadodo tɔtrɔwo. Kpɔ egbɔ be èzãa email si nekpɔna zã sia zã.
settings.securelyChangePassword: Trɔ wò account nyagbe le mɔ dedie nu
settings.currentPasswordPlaceholder: Ŋlɔ wò nyagbe si nèzãm fifia
settings.confirmPasswordPlaceholder: Ɖo kpe wò nyagbe yeye dzi
settings.passwordStrengthNote: Nyagbe sesẽwo me kua nyagbe gã kple suetɔwo, numbawo, kple dzesi tɔxɛwo.
settings.languageChangeNote: Gbe tɔtrɔ atrɔ nyawo katã le app la me. Ɖewohĩ, ele be woalala vie hafi nyaɖeɖewo nefɔ va.

profile.addSomePhotos: Tsɔ fotowo kpe na wò profile la
profile.selectInterests: Tia didi siwo tututu lebe awò
profile.enhanceProfile: Wɔ wò profile la nyo wu kple nyatakataka geɖewo
profile.confirmLocation: Ɖo kpe wò nɔƒe la dzi
profile.profileSaved: Wodzra wò profile la ɖo dzidzedzetɔe
profile.pleaseAddPhoto: Taflatse, tsɔ foto ɖeka pɛ kpe do ŋgɔ be nayi edzi
profile.confirmDeletePhoto: Èka ɖe dzi be yeadi be yeaɖe foto sia ɖa?
profile.previewDescription: Ale ame bubuwo akpɔ wò profile ne wole swiping wɔm

appMode.heatDescription: Kadodo kple xɔlɔ̃wo eye namã nuteƒekpɔnuwo
appMode.suiteDescription: Tu wò dɔmewɔla ƒe network kple mɔnukpɔkpɔwo
appMode.meetLongDescription: Dze si Ghana siŋgletɔwo le xexea me godoo hena lɔlɔ̃kadodo kple zɔzɔnu tiatiawo
appMode.heatLongDescription: Di eye nɛ wɔ kadodo kple Ghana ƒe nutowomeviwo, dekɔnukukukewo, kple habɔbɔwo le xexea me godoo
appMode.suiteLongDescription: Tu dɔwɔmevi kadodowo kple Ghana dɔwɔlawo to kpɔkplɔ, dɔwo kple dɔwɔnumɔnukpɔkpɔwo me

swipeCard.topInterests: Nu siwo dzea dzi na wò
swipeCard.likeError: Miate ŋu aɖo wò lɛk o. Taflatse gaɖo agbagba.
swipeCard.checkBackSoon: Míele ame bubuwo dim na wò. Gatrɔ va kpɔ kpuie!

matches.noMatchesDescription: Ne ème kple ame aɖe la, woaɖe wo afia le afisia
matches.noPotentialMatches: Match siwo ate ŋu ava aɖeke meli o fifia

chat.noMessagesDescription: Dze dzeɖoɖo kple match siwo nèkpɔ
chat.confirmDeleteConversation: Èka ɖe dzi be yeadi be yeaɖe dzeɖoɖoa sia ɖa?
chat.deleteMessageConfirm: Èka ɖe dzi be yeadi be yeaɖe gbedasi sia ɖa?

videoCalls.callFailedDescription: Mate ŋu awɔ yɔyɔ ƒe kadodo o
videoCalls.speaker: Nuƒogbɔŋu
videoCalls.missedCall: Yɔyɔ si meɖo nya ŋu o
videoCalls.missedCallDescription: Mèɖo {{name}} ƒe yɔyɔ nya ŋu o

settings.controlWhetherToShow: Ɖu dzi le dɔwɔƒe tiatia ƒukpo fiafia ŋu le ge me vɔ megbe
settings.whenTurnedOnYoullBeAsked: Ne wòle dɔ dzi la, woabia wo be dɔwɔƒe ka nèdi be yeazã le ge me vɔ megbe
settings.whenTurnedOnReturningUsers: Ne wòle dɔ dzi la, ame siwo gbɔna akpɔ dukɔmetɔnyenye tiatia ƒukpowo hafi dɔwɔƒe tiatia
settings.whenTurnedOffDirectLogin: Ne wòtsi la, àge ɖe dɔwɔƒe si nezã mamã me tẽe
settings.whenTurnedOffSkipNationality: Ne wòtsi la, ame siwo gbɔna atso dukɔmetɔnyenye tiatia ƒukpowo dzi ayi
settings.customizeAppExperience: Wɔ wò dɔwɔƒe nuteƒekpɔkpɔ abe ale si nèdi ene
settings.twoFactorAuth: Dzesi eve siwo woatsɔ agblɔ wò dzesi
